name: Hod Putt
description: Bill Piersol; Killed someone near Procters Grove.

name: Ollie McGee
description: Has a husband Fletcher McGee who secretly destroyed her.

name: Fletcher McGee
description: Destroyed by Ollie McGee's wife.

name: Robert Fulton Tanner
description: Bitten by rat.

name: Cassius Hueffer
description: No information available.

name: Serepta Hueffer
description: No information available.

name: Amanda Barker
description: Husband Henry unknown.

name: Constance Harley
description: Mothered sister's children Irene & Mary.

name: Chase Henry
description: Drunkard denied burial by priest unknown; Buried close to banker Nicholas and wife Priscilla.

name: Harry Carey Goodhue
description: Chase Henry's spiritual brother; Fought against everything.

name: Judge Somers
description: Praised by Justice Breese; Chase Henry has marble grave but he has none.

name: Kinsey Keene
description: Addresses Thomas Rhodes (bank), Coolbaugh Whedon (newspaper), Rev. Peet (church), A.D. Blood (mayor).

name: Benjamin Pantier
description: Rejected by Mrs. Benjamin Pantier wife; Brother of Reuben.

name: Mrs. Benjamin Pantier
description: Mother of Reuben Pantier; Drove away Benjamin Pantier.

name: Reuben Pantier
description: Spark fire of life started and influenced by Emily Sparks.

name: Emily Sparks
description: Did before she knew if she had inspired Reuben Pantier but she left.

name: Trainor the Druggist
description: Described Ben, Mrs. Pantier, and Reuben.

name: Daisy Fraser
description: Called out Editor Don, Circuit Judge, Rev. Peet, and Sibley; Brought before Justice Arnett.

name: Benjamin Fraser
description: Son of Benjamin Pantier and Daisy Fraser.

name: Minerva Jones
description: Raped by "Butch" Weldy; Doe Myers tried to save her but failed.

name: “Indignation” Jones
description: Father of Minerva Jones.

name: Doe Myers
description: *thinks that Doe Hill did more for the people of the town then him*; Tried to save Minerva Jones; Disgraced by newspapers; Mrs. Myers died.

name: Mrs. Meyers
description: Died from broken heart of Doc Meyers husband.

name: “Butch” Weldy
description: Hired by son of Old Rhodes; No money from Circuit Judge; Blind as Jack the Fiddler.

name: Knowlt Hoheimer
description: Stole dogs of Curl Trenary; Ran from Justice Arnett.

name: Lydia Puckett
description: Married to Knowlt Hoheimer; Cheated with Lucius Atherton.

name: Frank Drummer
description: No information available.

name: Hare Drummer
description: Children go to Aaron Haitfield and Sievers farm Conrad Siever.

name: Doc Hill
description: Wife and son hate him; Saw Em Stanton.

name: Andy the Night-Watch
description: Saw Doc Hill.

name: Sarah Brown
description: Cheats on unknown huasband with Maurice.

name: Percy Bysshe Shelley
description: Father sent him to University; Roamed fields with Bert Kessler.

name: Flossie Cabanis
description: Brindle's opera house; Saw Ralph Barrett acting; Condemned by Thomas Rhodes; Argued against by Jefferson Howard.

name: Julia Miller
description: Has 65-year old husband.

name: Johnnie Sayre
description: Addresses Father unknown; Taken to house of widow Morris.

name: Charlie French
description: O'Brien boy snapped toy pistol; "Bucky" Estil fired cannon from Captain Harris.

name: Zenas Witt
description: Can't memorize like Frank Drummer; Saw Dr. Weese's ad.

name: Theodrore the Poet
description: No information available.

name: The Town Marshall
description: *Maybe include this an example of a prohibisionist was deacon Taylor so he could have voted him in*; Killed a Swede near Maple Grove; Struck Jack McGuire with cane and was killed by him.

name: Jack McGuire
description: Logan town Marshal hit him so he killed him; His Lawyer Kinsey Keene helped out old Thomas Rhodes; Judge was friend of Rhodes.

name: Dorcas Gustine
description: No information available.

name: Nicholas Bindle
description: Gave pipe organ to Deacon Rhodes.

name: Jacob Goodpasture
description: Son died at Fort Sumter.

name: Harold Arnett
description: Heard coughing of John Yarnell; Has wife unknown.

name: Margaret Fuller Slack
description: Photograph from Penniwit; Wooed by John Slack the druggist.

name: George Trimble
description: Taxed by Henry George; Has wife unknown who made him join the church; Interripted in session by Willie Metcalf.

name: Dr. Siegfried Iseman
description: Incarcerated by Federal Judge for fraud.

name: “Ace” Shaw
description: No information available.

name: Lois Spears
description: Born Lois Fluke of Willard Fluke; Wife of Cyrus Spears; Mother of Myrtle and Virgil Spears.

name: Justice Arnett
description: Docket shaken loose by Butch Weldy burning explosion.

name: Willard Fluke
description: Wife is Lois Spears; Cheated with "Cleopatra.

name: Aner Clute
description: Promise of Marriage from Lucius Atherton.

name: Lucius Atherton
description: Lived at Mayer's restaurant; Someone sings of Beatrice.

name: Homer Clapp
description: Aner Clute refused him kiss; Usurped by Lucius Atherton.

name: Deacon Taylor
description: Stole alcohol from Trainor the Druggist.

name: Sam Hookey
description: Loved Mademoiselle Estralada, lion tamer; Beat Brutus, Leo, and Gypsy; Killed by Brutus.

name: Cooney Potter
description: Has a wife, 2 sons, and 2 daughters; Wronged by Squire Higbee.

name: Fiddler Jones
description: Cooney Potter ignores girls.

name: Nellie Clark
description: Raped by Charlie and father almost killed him if not for his mother; Married widower of 35.

name: Louise Smith
description: Herbert broke their engagement to cheat with Annabelle.

name: Herbert Marshall
description: Broker engagement with Louise Smith to be with Annabelle.

name: George Gray
description: No information available.

name: Hon. Henry Bennett
description: Adored by Jenny, 35, and he was 70; Jerry married Willard Shafer who was strong from Georgie Kirby after he died.

name: Griffy the Cooper
description: No information available.

name: Sexsmith the Dentist
description: Daisy Fraser was ejected from home; Johnny Taylor and Burchard's poler room closed up to Thomas Rhodes.

name: A.D. Blood
description: Daisy Fraser brought before Justice Arnett; Dora and Reuben Pantier sleep together on his grave.

name: Robert Southey Burke
description: Spent life trying to elect A.D. Blood mayor.

name: Dora Williams
description: Reuben Pantier left her; Married drunkard who made her rich; Married Tyler Rountree and Count Navigato in Genoa.

name: Mrs. Williams
description: Mother of Dora Williams.

name: William and Emily
description: Love each other greatly.

name: The Circuit Judge
description: Hanged Hod Putt the murderer.

name: Blind Jack
description: “Butch” Weldy and Jack McGuire made him play fiddle and was killed.

name: John Horace Burleson
description: Married banker's daughter and became bank president.

name: Nancy Knapp
description: Husband inherited a lot of money to buy farm and was rejected.

name: Barry Holden
description: Brother of Nancy Knapp; Tried Dr. Duval for murdering Zora Clemens; Mortgaged farm to Thomas Rhodes; Killed his pregnant wife with 8 children.

name: State's Attorney Fallas
description: Attorney who made jury kill Barry Holden; Doctor messed up son and made him idiot.

name: Wendell P. Boyd
description: Beaten to death by Catholic guard for blasphemy; Stoop up for Daisy Fraser.

name: Francis Turner
description: Kissed Mary and died.

name: Franklin Jones
description: Killed by workman.

name: John M. Church
description: Attorney for the "Q" and Indemnity Company to insure owner of mine; Beat claims of crippled widow and orphan.

name: Russian Sonia
description: Dancer met Patrick Summer and lived together.

name: Isa Nutter
description: Diagnosed with satyriasis by Doc Myers and with leucaemia by Doc Hill; Thought of Minnie constantly and married her eventually.

name: Barney Hainsfeather
description: Mistaken for John Allen; Ran clothing store in town.

name: Petit, the Poet
description: No information available.

name: Pauline Barrett
description: Destroyed physically by surgeons; Relationship with husband deteriorating.

name: Mrs. Charles Bliss
description: Divorced husband with four (4) children; Told not to by Reverend Wiley; Judge Somers advised husband.

name: Mrs. George Reece
description: Husband was cashier of brank which failed due to Thomas Rhodes and his son; Husband sent to prison.

name: Rev. Lemuel Wiley
description: Saved Blisses from divorce.

name: Thomnas Ross, Jr.
description: No information available.

name: Rev. Abner Peet
description: Trunk was sold to Burchard, tavern keeper who burned sermons.

name: Jefferson Howard
description: Has a wife and children; Argued against Jogn Cabanis.

name: Judge Selah Lively
description: Went from grocery clerk to law attorney for Thomas Rhodes; Became County Judge and was respected by Jefferson Howard, Kinsey Keene, and Harmon Whitney.

name: Albert Schirding
description: Says he had worse fate than Jonas Keene; Was failure but successful children; Daughter won prize in Paris for Old Miss Painting of Henry Wilin, so he committed suicide.

name: Jonas Keene
description: Confused why Albert Schirding killed himself to be County Superintendent of Schools; Had failure children.

name: Eugenia Todd
description: No information available.

name: Yee Bow
description: Harry Wiley minister son killed him with single punch.

name: Washington McNeely
description: Good children: John fled country, Jenny died with child, Harry killed himself, Susan divorced, Paul was invalided, Mary became recluse; Wife died.

name: Paul McNeely
description: Jane tried to save him from death.

name: Mary McNeely
description: Long years of solitude at fathers house after husband left.

name: Daniel M'Cumber
description: Left Mary McNeely; Cheated with Laura, the landlady's daughter; Met Georgine Miner from Niles whose loved had tired of her.

name: Georgine Sand Miner
description: Married to squaw man, she was mistress; Daniel radical had for years who sister called her his mistress; Lesbian friend hated Daniel's sister and Daniel hated her small husband.

name: Thomas Rhodes
description: Condemns Margaret Fuller Slacks, Petits, and Tennessee Calflin Shops.

name: Ida Chicken
description: Met Thomas Rhodes on train to Peoria; Clerk of district Court made him swear to defend Constitution; Federal Judge decided that Constitution exempted Thomas Rhodes from paying taxes.

name: Penniwit, the Artist
description: Painted picture of Judge Somers, attorney-at-law.

name: Jim Brown
description: Was handling Dom Pedro and Rile Potter was singing; Listened to Rev. Peet's lecture on holy land; Rev. Peet and Social Purity Club headed by Ben Pantier's wife asked to take Dom Pedro from barn of Washington McNeely done by A.D. Blood; Saved by Banjamin Pantier and Fiddler Jones.

name: Robert Davidson
description: No information available.

name: Elsa Wertman
description: Peasant girl from Germany; Worked at Thomas Greene's who raped her; Mrs. Greene (Francis Harris) adopted her child, Hamilton Greene, politician; She later married Gus Wertman.
